title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2428/87 of 7 August 1987 amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary and Romania
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2428/87
of 7 August 1987
amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary and Romania
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantiative limits for textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary and Romania, as fixed in Annexes III and IV to Regulation (EEC) No 4136/86, are hereby amended for 1987 as laid down in Annexes I and II hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 August 1987.
For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1976, p. 42.
